name: Explorer- Pixel World Version
description:
Explorer- Pixel World Version is Here!

Play the biggest update to so far! iOS 11 READY ! It’s the overhaul of a generation. Download it now and see for yourself !

Go on a fun mini game adventure - Over 3 different kinds of mini games to play from ! Skydiving, Retro Platformer, & Find the blocks game !

Universal Game - There’s never been a better time to enjoy this on all devices!

***This game is not affiliated with Minecraft or Mojang AB.*****

Great for all ages!
